locations.name: Shadow Falls Mill
locations.description: The main source of flour and lumber in the village.
locations.details: The main source of flour and lumber in the village, the Shadow Falls Mill is a noisy and productive place, where the villagers and the outsiders can see and buy various products and materials, such as wheat, corn, barley, wood, and charcoal. The miller, Gus, is a hardworking and honest man, who runs and operates his mill with efficiency and care. The mill has a waterwheel, a grinder, a saw, and a warehouse.
